00041                 protected function init()
00042                 {
00043                         // Call parent's init method
00044                         parent::init();
00045 
00046                         $this->caches_page(array('download_stats', 'widgets_versioncheck', 'releasenotes', 'changelog'));
00047                         $this->before_filter('block_ip');
00048                         $this->before_filter('log_visit', array('except' => array('widgets_versioncheck', 'download', 'download_stats', 'user_quotes')));
00049                         $this->after_filter('shrink_html', array('except' => array('widgets_versioncheck', 'download', 'download_stats', 'user_quotes')));
00050                         $this->after_filter('compress');
00051                 }

00053                 public function index()
00054                 {
00055                         $release_factory = new SoftwareRelease();
00056                         $this->releases = $release_factory->find_by_query('SELECT MAX(`software_releases`.`id`) AS `id`, `software_releases`.`software_id`, MAX(`software_releases`.`version`) AS `version`, MAX(`software_releases`.`date`) AS `date` ' .
00057                                 'FROM `softwares` ' .
00058                                 'LEFT JOIN `software_releases` ON `softwares`.`id` = `software_releases`.`software_id` ' .
00059                                 'GROUP BY `softwares`.`id` ' .
00060                                 'ORDER BY `date` DESC ');
00061                 }

00087                 public function widgets_versioncheck()
00088                 {
00089                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00090 
00091                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00092                         {
00093                                 if (!isset($_GET['software_name']) &&
00094                                         isset($_GET['name']))
00095                                 {
00096                                         $_GET['software_name'] = $_GET['name'];
00097                                 }
00098 
00099                                 $software_factory = new Software();
00100                                 $softwares = $software_factory->find_by_query('SELECT `id` ' .
00101                                         'FROM `softwares` ' .
00102                                         'WHERE `name` = \'' . $conn->escape($_GET['software_name']) . '\' ' .
00103                                         'AND `type` = \'widgets\' ' .
00104                                         'LIMIT 1');
00105 
00106                                 if (count($softwares) > 0)
00107                                 {
00108                                         $_REQUEST['id'] = $softwares[0]->id;
00109                                 }
00110                                 else
00111                                 {
00112                                         $softwares = $software_factory->find_by_query('SELECT `softwares`.`id` ' .
00113                                                 'FROM `softwares` ' .
00114                                                 'LEFT JOIN `software_typos` ON `softwares`.`id` = `software_typos`.`software_id` ' .
00115                                                 'WHERE `software_typos`.`typo` = \'' . $conn->escape($_GET['software_name']) . '\' ' .
00116                                                 'AND `softwares`.`type` = \'widgets\' ' .
00117                                                 'LIMIT 1');
00118                                         if (count($softwares) > 0)
00119                                         {
00120                                                 $_REQUEST['id'] = $softwares[0]->id;
00121                                         }
00122                                         else
00123                                         {
00124                                                 HTTP::error(404);
00125                                         }
00126                                 }
00127                         }
00128                         $release_factory = new SoftwareRelease();
00129                         $releases = $release_factory->find_by_query('SELECT  MAX(`software_releases`.`id`) AS `id`, MAX(`software_releases`.`version`) AS `version` ' .
00130                                 'FROM `software_releases` ' .
00131                                 'LEFT JOIN `softwares` ON `software_releases`.`software_id` = `softwares`.`id` ' .
00132                                 'WHERE `softwares`.`id` = \'' . $conn->escape($_REQUEST['id']) . '\' ' .
00133                                 'AND `softwares`.`type` = \'widgets\' ' .
00134                                 'AND `software_releases`.`released` = 1 ' .
00135                                 'GROUP BY `software_releases`.`software_id` ' .
00136                                 'LIMIT 1');
00137                         if (count($releases) > 0)
00138                         {
00139                                 $this->output = $releases[0]->version;
00140                         }
00141                         else
00142                         {
00143                                 $this->output = l('No such widget');
00144                         }
00145                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE, 'final' => TRUE));
00146 
00147                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00148                 }

00264                 public function post_comment()
00265                 {
00266                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00267 
00268                         if (!$this->request->is_post())
00269                         {
00270                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00271                         }
00272                         $software = new Software();
00273                         if ($software->find_by_id($_POST['software_id']) === FALSE)
00274                         {
00275                                 $this->flash(l('No such software'), 'error');
00276                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00277                         }
00278 
00279                         if (!Email::is_valid($_POST['email']))
00280                         {
00281                                 $this->flash(l('Please enter a valid email address'), 'error');
00282                                 $this->redirect_to($software->comments_permalink());
00283                         }
00284                         if (!Antispam::check_math())
00285                         {
00286                                 $this->flash(Antispam::random_comment(), 'error');
00287                                 $this->redirect_to($software->comments_permalink());
00288                         }
00289 
00290                         // A static class method would be infinitely better...
00291                         $comment = new SoftwareComment($_POST);
00292                         $comment->created_at = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00293                         $comment->save();
00294 
00295                         // Send an email to notify this comment
00296                         $email = new SoftwareCommentEmail(array('comment' => $comment,
00297                                 'name' => $_POST['author'],
00298                                 'email' => $_POST['email'],
00299                                 'URL' => $_POST['URL']));
00300                         $email->send();
00301 
00302                         if (isset($_POST['remember_me']))
00303                         {
00304                                 $this->set_credentials($_POST['author'],
00305                                         $_POST['email'],
00306                                         $_POST['URL']);
00307                         }
00308 
00309                         // Expires the cache of Comments feed
00310                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'software_comments', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00311 
00312                         $this->redirect_to_software_page(array('id' => $_POST['software_id'], 'subview' => 'comments', 'hash' => ('comment-' . $comment->id)));
00313 
00314                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00315                 }

00341                 public function releasenotes()
00342                 {
00343                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00344                         {
00345                                 $release_factory = new SoftwareRelease();
00346                                 $releases = $release_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * FROM `software_releases` ' .
00347                                         'WHERE `software_id` = \'' . $_REQUEST['id'] . '\' ' .
00348                                         'AND `released` = 1 ' .
00349                                         'ORDER BY `date` DESC ' .
00350                                         'LIMIT 1');
00351                                 if (count($releases) < 1)
00352                                 {
00353                                         HTTP::error(404);
00354                                 }
00355                                 $this->release = $releases[0];
00356                                 $this->release->belongs_to('softwares');
00357                                 $this->render(array('layout' => 'software_releasenotes'));
00358                         }
00359                         else
00360                         {
00361                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00362                         }
00363                 }

00370                 public function user_quotes()
00371                 {
00372                         if (!empty($_GET['id']))
00373                         {
00374                                 $software = new Software();
00375                                 if ($software->find_by_id($_GET['id']) === FALSE)
00376                                 {
00377                                         $this->flash(l('No such software product!'), 'error');
00378                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00379                                 }
00380                                 $software->has_many('software_quotes');
00381                                 $quotes = $software->software_quotes;
00382                                 if (count($quotes) > 0)
00383                                 {
00384                                         $this->quotes = $quotes;
00385                                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00386                                 }
00387                                 else
00388                                 {
00389                                         $this->render(NULL);
00390                                 }
00391                         }
00392                         else
00393                         {
00394                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00395                         }
00396                 }

00404                 public function download()
00405                 {
00406                         if (!empty($_REQUEST['id']))
00407                         {
00408                                 $artifact = new SoftwareArtifact();
00409                                 if ($artifact->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00410                                 {
00411                                         HTTP::error(404);
00412                                 }
00413                                 $artifact->downloads++;
00414                                 $artifact->save();
00415 
00416                                 if (self::SOFTWARE_SAVE_DOWNLOADS)
00417                                 {
00418                                         // Logs the download
00419                                         $download = new SoftwareDownload();
00420                                         $download->artifact_id = $_REQUEST['id'];
00421                                         $download->save();
00422                                 }
00423 
00424                                 // Expires the cache of Download Stats
00425                                 // Remember: Download Stats are cached by release_id
00426                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('action' => 'download_stats', 'id' => $artifact->release_id));
00427 
00428                                 if ($artifact->URL)
00429                                 {
00430                                         $this->redirect_to($artifact->URL);
00431                                 }
00432                                 else
00433                                 {
00434                                         $filename = $artifact->local_file();
00435                                         if ($filename)
00436                                         {
00437                                                 $dl_mgr = new DownloadManager($filename);
00438                                                 $dl_mgr->start_download();
00439                                         }
00440                                 }
00441                         }
00442                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00443                 }
00444 
00450                 public function download_stats()
00451                 {
00452                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00453 
00454                         $release = new SoftwareRelease();
00455                         if ($release->find_by_id($_GET['id']) === FALSE)
00456                         {
00457                                 $this->flash(l('No such software release!'), 'error');
00458                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00459                         }
00460                         $release->belongs_to('softwares');
00461 
00462                         $conn->prepare('SELECT SUM(`downloads`) FROM `software_artifacts` WHERE `release_id` = \'{1}\'',
00463                                 $release->id);
00464                         $conn->exec();
00465                         $this->partial = $conn->result(0);
00466 
00467                         $conn->prepare('SELECT SUM(`downloads`) FROM `software_artifacts` WHERE `software_id` = \'{1}\'',
00468                                 $release->software->id);
00469                         $conn->exec();
00470                         $this->total = $conn->result(0);
00471 
00472                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00473 
00474                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00475                 }

00482                 public function redirect_to_software_page($params)
00483                 {
00484                         $software = new Software();
00485                         $software->find_by_id($params['id']);
00486                         $URL = sprintf('http://%s/%s/%s/%s/%s.html',
00487                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00488                                 $this->name,
00489                                 $software->type,
00490                                 $software->name,
00491                                 $params['subview']);
00492                         if (isset($params['hash']))
00493                         {
00494                                 $URL .= '#' . $params['hash'];
00495                         }
00496                         $this->redirect_to($URL);
00497                 }

00503                 private function _init_software()
00504                 {
00505                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00506 
00507                         if (isset($_REQUEST['software_name']))
00508                         {
00509                                 $software_factory = new Software();
00510                                 $softwares = $software_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => ('`name` = \'' . $conn->escape($_REQUEST['software_name']) . '\' AND `type` = \'' . $conn->escape($_REQUEST['software_type']) . '\''),
00511                                         'limit' => 1));
00512                                 if (count($softwares) > 0)
00513                                 {
00514                                         $this->software = $softwares[0];
00515                                 }
00516                                 else
00517                                 {
00518                                         $softwares = $software_factory->find_by_query('SELECT `softwares`.`id` ' .
00519                                                 'FROM `softwares` ' .
00520                                                 'LEFT JOIN `software_typos` ON `softwares`.`id` = `software_typos`.`software_id` ' .
00521                                                 'WHERE `software_typos`.`typo` = \'' . $conn->escape($_REQUEST['software_name']) . '\' ' .
00522                                                 'LIMIT 1');
00523                                         if (count($softwares) > 0)
00524                                         {
00525                                                 $this->software = $softwares[0];
00526                                                 header(sprintf('Location: http://%s%s',
00527                                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00528                                                         $this->software->url_to_detail($_REQUEST['subview'])));
00529                                                 exit();
00530                                         }
00531                                         else
00532                                         {
00533                                                 HTTP::error(404);
00534                                         }
00535                                 }
00536                                 $_REQUEST['id'] = $this->software->id;
00537                         }
00538                         else if (isset($_GET['id']))
00539                         {
00540                                 $this->software = new Software();
00541                                 if ($this->software->find_by_id($_GET['id']) === FALSE)
00542                                 {
00543                                         $this->flash(l('No such software product!'), 'error');
00544                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'index'));
00545                                 }
00546                         }
00547                         else
00548                         {
00549                                 HTTP::error(404);
00550                         }
00551                         $this->software->has_many('software_releases', array('where_clause' => '`released` = \'1\''));
00552                         $releases = $this->software->software_releases;
00553                         usort($releases, array($releases[0], 'sort_releases'));
00554                         $this->release = $releases[0];
00555                         $this->software->software_releases = $releases;
00556 
00557                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00558                 }
00559         }
